cause.description:
Bringing Health to Kids in Crisis
1. Giving Children Hope provides emergency disaster relief.
2. Giving Children Hope believes that through recycling medicall excess we can help the environment.
3. Giving Children Hope believes that it's pretty simple to change the world by equipping community leaders with the resources they need.
4. Giving Children Hope thinks no child in our community should go hungry.
cause.mission: Providing basic needs direct to community leaders.
cause.name: Giving Children Hope
